original_text: Balak took Balaam to the field of Zophim. It was at the top of Pisgah mountain. Balak built seven altars there. He offered a bull and a male sheep on each altar as sacrifices.
korean_text: 소빔 들로 인도하여 비스가 꼭대기에 이르러 일곱 제단을 쌓고 각 제단에 수송아지와 숫양을 드리니

sentences.original_text: Balak took Balaam to the field of Zophim
It was at the top of Pisgah mountain
He offered a bull on each altar as sacrifices
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 각 제단에 황소 한 마리를 제물로 바쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: He offered a male sheep on each altar as sacrifices
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 각 제단에 숫양 한 마리를 제물로 바쳤습니다
